title: On the Rank of a bicomplex matrix
authors: Amita, Mamta Amol Wagh, Suman Kumar and Akhil Prakash
abstract:
The paper explores the concept of the rank of a bicomplex matrix, delving
into four distinct types of ranks and investigating conditions under which
these ranks are equivalent. It also defines and analyzes the concept of
idempotent row space and idempotent column space of a bicomplex matrix. Some
examples and counter examples have been presented to substantiate the study.
